# SSH public keys for trusted releasers.
#
# Only tags signed by one of these keys (or the GPG keys in gpg.asc) will be accepted for release.
#
# Format: [namespace],[public key] [github-username]
#
# Example:
# github.com,ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIB... timriley
# github.com,ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIC... flash-gordon
# github.com,ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAID... cllns
#
# Add one line per authorized SSH key, with the GitHub username at the end.

github.com,ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIJVeJ3lQW5izwzDWUCoZMlnDTv9FahsJoHVlpQvpqxZe timriley
